gravity.impl
Class DefaultRegistry

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--gravity.impl.DefaultRegistry
All Implemented Interfaces:
MutableRegistry, Registry
public class DefaultRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
implements MutableRegistry

This is the container that houses all components and configurations.

getComponentInstance

public java.lang.Object getComponentInstance(java.lang.Class compIntf,
                                             java.lang.Object compType)
Gets the service registered for the supplied service key (service interface + service implementation type).

Specified by:
getComponentInstance in interface Registry
Returns:
The service registered for the supplied key.
Throws:
UsageException - When no service is registered for the supplied key.

returnComponentInstance

public void returnComponentInstance(java.lang.Class compIntf,
                                    java.lang.Object compType,
                                    java.lang.Object comp)
Description copied from interface: Registry
This method should be used to return a component instance obtained via one of the getComponentInstance(...) methods. This method is primarily used for returning pooled components.

Specified by:
returnComponentInstance in interface Registry
